nodes.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.

nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，帮助你保持积极向上，避免消极情绪。JOI是一款以简单有趣的方式记录心情日记的完美工具。观察你的心情和一天中的活动之间的关联，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋里的自理助手，让你更快乐。

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，幫助你保持積極向上，避免消極情緒。JOI是一款以簡單有趣的方式記錄心情日記的完美工具。觀察你的心情和一天中的活動之間的關聯，看看你生活中的模式。

nodes.excerpt: data analytics company for the music industry and enables users to analyze the acquired data and use them as required. PlayTreks data analytics services can assist in product development, identifying potential market gaps, improve efficiency, extend reach.

localize.tagline: 音乐发行和跨渠道数据仪表板

nodes.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
nodes.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.
nodes.author: Meng Taing

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。

nodes.excerpt: 💰 Did you make bank on $GME, $AMC or anything Elon mentioned? Did you cash in at your startup's IPO? 👉 Think you can invest in this fund? You probably aren't rich enough. 🤑 This could be the fund for you.

nodes.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
nodes.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring
nodes.author: Ronald Langeveld

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自动化的网速性能分析工具。一个小型的开源脚本每隔一小时对docker镜像进行一次速度测试，并可以在易于使用的Dashboard上进行分析。
localize.tagline: 互联网性能自动监测

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自動化的網速性能分析工具。一個小型的開源腳本每隔一小時對docker鏡像進行一次速度測試，並可以在易於使用的Dashboard上進行分析。
localize.tagline: 互聯網性能自動監測

nodes.excerpt: React Bundle by Flatlogic is a collection of various templates. You can see three admin templates with classic design, one with material one, a mobile starter template, a user management template, and an accounting template.

nodes.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isn’t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.

nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和开放的互联网，而不是由少数大科技公司主导？现在，你可以通过运营一个Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成为革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成为节点运营商。

localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成爲節點運營商。

nodes.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
nodes.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs
nodes.author: Dave Stewart

localize.description: 该扩展程序通过搜索您的浏览器历史记录并显示任何发现的暂停标签，试图恢复您暂停的Great Suspender标签。然后您可以 - 调整分组、排序和细节 - 保存为文件夹和书签 - 将URL复制到剪贴板上
localize.tagline: 恢复您丢失的Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 該擴展程序通過搜索您的瀏覽器歷史記錄並顯示任何發現的暫停標籤，試圖恢復您暫停的Great Suspender標籤。然後您可以 - 調整分組、排序和細節 - 保存爲文件夾和書籤 - 將URL複製到剪貼板上
localize.tagline: 恢復您丟失的Great Suspender tabs

nodes.excerpt: Pod Stack is an easy-to-use Notion template that helps you create & manage your podcast. You'll find hundreds of prebuilt components, tools, and resources. From episode preparation to monetization, we have you covered. Get $5 off with "producthunt"!

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

localize.description: ICONFi是一个数字资产储蓄平台。ICONFi可以让你赚取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在内的数字资产的利息，并提供一个简单的ICX押注解决方案。ICONFi以简单、安全的用户界面帮助你增加投资。
localize.tagline: ICONFi让你的储蓄变得简单。

localize.description: ICONFi是一個數字資產儲蓄平臺。ICONFi可以讓你賺取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在內的數字資產的利息，並提供一個簡單的ICX押注解決方案。ICONFi以簡單、安全的用戶界面幫助你增加投資。
localize.tagline: ICONFi讓你的儲蓄變得簡單。
